oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Organics" in general
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: - Transport is important in the carbon footprint of imported organic plant products. - Ecosystem services of biodiversity in organic grasslands. - Innovation research in value chains. International organic research theme: - Organic research of the U.S. Agricultural Research Service. - Mental models and participatory research to redesign extension programming for organic weed management
